<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\file Shape utility for AMX.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AMX hardware requires to config the shape of tile data register before use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The 2D shape includes row and column. In AMX intrinsics interface the shape</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is passed as 1st and 2nd parameter and they are lowered as the 1st and 2nd</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// machine operand of AMX pseudo instructions. ShapeT class is to facilitate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tile config and register allocator. The row and column are machine operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of AMX pseudo instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of rows of 2nd destination buffer is assigned by the one of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1st destination buffer. If the column size is equal to zero, the row</span></CodeLine>
